definition: wise move/masterstroke/bright ideas
high/tall/above average/loud/your (honorific)
surname Gao
to recruit/to provoke/to beckon/to incur/to infect/contagious/a move (chess)/a maneuver/device/trick/to confess

sentences.english: Today, more than 3 years, Hong Kong people have any good ideas ideas?
sentences.chinese: 时至今日，3年有余，港人对此有何高招妙法？

sentences.english: The diktats of American imperialism through the medium of Murdoch were pre-eminent.
sentences.chinese: 美国通过默多克的媒体帝国来进行下令真是高招。

sentences.english: Sidney’s been chased up and down the stairs so many times now, she must have killer calves.
sentences.chinese: 西德妮现在倍受追捧，她肯定有什么勾引人的高招。

sentences.english: I wanted to know the secret.
sentences.chinese: 我想知道他有什么高招。

sentences.english: Will this rise in upstarts lead to the next big idea in tech?
sentences.chinese: 这一波新增的企业会给未来的高科技带来高招妙策吗？

definition: excellent plan/brilliant scheme
smart move/clever way of doing sth
brocade sack of miracle plans (idiom); bag of tricks/fiendishly cunning masterplan (written out by strategic genius of fiction, and given to the local commander in a brocade bag)
move (in chess, on stage, in martial arts)/gambit/trick/scheme/movement/same as 著數|着数[zhao1 shu4]
good plan/good idea
to counter every move/to be full of tricks
to recruit/to provoke/to beckon/to incur/to infect/contagious/a move (chess)/a maneuver/device/trick/to confess
way/method/Taiwan pr. [fa2 zi5]
unique skill/unexpected tricky move (as a last resort)/masterstroke/finishing blow
trick/maneuver/razzle-dazzle/(martial arts) fancy move/flourish
trick/scheme/ploy/tactic/stratagem/gimmick/ruse/trickery/skill/also written 技倆|技俩
much obliged/thank you/to ask advice/(ironically or humorously) to experience/to taste
to make a move (in martial arts or figuratively)
trick/scheme/ploy/tactic/stratagem/gimmick/ruse/trickery/skill/usually written 伎倆|伎俩
to be a step ahead of the opponent (idiom)/to outsmart one's opponent
move/method of use/trick for success
